name: simple-react-video
description: A simple HTML5 video wrapper use react and mobx

scripts.build: set NODE_ENV=production && babel ./src -d lib --ignore '*.spec.js' && npm run copy
scripts.release:major: npm version prerelease &&  npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:minor: npm version prerelease && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:patch: npm version prerelease && git push --follow-tags && npm publish --tag beta

author: alan.yang
